about_the_game:
Don't let her charm fool you. She is a trained liquidator of royal dolls. King Puppetupon was her target. Nothing easier. Each step and every variant has been 100% planned. At least she thought so. There was no attack on the king because our Geisha got tangled in her own strings. Now she is fighting in the arena for her freedom. Will her cleverness and speed help her with this?

This product is an addition content to BeatMe! It contains one playable character with unique skills and playstyle.

Explore new posibilities, with new characters in this lovely party brawler!
detailed_description:
Don't let her charm fool you. She is a trained liquidator of royal dolls. King Puppetupon was her target. Nothing easier. Each step and every variant has been 100% planned. At least she thought so. There was no attack on the king because our Geisha got tangled in her own strings. Now she is fighting in the arena for her freedom. Will her cleverness and speed help her with this?

This product is an addition content to BeatMe! It contains one playable character with unique skills and playstyle.

Explore new posibilities, with new characters in this lovely party brawler!
name: Puppetonia Tournament - GEISHA

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Graphics: GTS 450
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

short_description: Geisha is a trained liquidator of royal dolls.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
